item.title: FFAM: Feature Factorization Activation Map for Explanation of 3D Detectors
item.description: FFAM uses feature factorization and gradient weighting to produce high-quality visual explanations for 3D object detectors, improving model interpretability and trust.

item.title: Frozen-DETR: Enhancing DETR with Image Understanding from Frozen Foundation Models
item.description: Frozen-DETR boosts object detection accuracy by integrating frozen foundation models as feature enhancers, achieving significant performance gains without the computational cost of fine-tuning.

item.title: TreeVI: Reparameterizable Tree-structured Variational Inference for Instance-level Correlation Capturing
item.description: TreeVI: Scalable tree-structured variational inference captures instance-level correlations for improved model accuracy.
